item.title: Trying to get a BBS running
item.description: Over the last few days, I've attempted to get a BBS up and going on one of my 8-bits. The original plan was to find a BBS that would run under SDX. I have an older MyIDE+Flash cart with a 256MB IDE drive which isn't being used right now â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
